v_emergency_exit.action-description-en: Press LShift + H to engage emergency exit
v_emergency_exit.action-description-en_GB: Press LShift + H to engage emergency exit

v_view_dynamic_zoom_abs_toggle.action-description-en: Holds the dynamic zoom as long as the button is held
v_view_dynamic_zoom_abs_toggle.action-description-en_GB: Holds the dynamic zoom as long as the button is held

v_toggle_relative_mouse_mode.action-description-en: Switches the mouse behavior for ship rotations between a relative (FPS style) and a Vjoy mode.
v_toggle_relative_mouse_mode.action-description-en_GB: Switches the mouse behavior for ship rotations between a relative (FPS style) and a Vjoy mode.

v_strafe_longitudinal_invert.action-description-en: Inverts Strafe Longitudinal Absolute Axis Half (Neutral - Backward)
v_strafe_longitudinal_invert.action-description-en_GB: Inverts Strafe Longitudinal Absolute Axis Half (Neutral - Backward)

v_ifcs_toggle_speed_limiter.action-description-en: Toggles Speed Limiter on and off
v_ifcs_toggle_speed_limiter.action-description-en_GB: Toggles Speed Limiter on and off

v_ifcs_speed_limiter_reset_scm.action-description-en: Resets Speed Limiter to full SCM.
v_ifcs_speed_limiter_reset_scm.action-description-en_GB: Resets Speed Limiter to full SCM.

v_accel_range_rel.action-description-en: Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (rel.) - Decreases / increases acceleration limiter relative to old value
v_accel_range_rel.action-description-en_GB: Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (rel.) - Decreases / increases acceleration limiter relative to old value

v_accel_range_abs.action-description-en: Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (abs.) - Decreases / increases acceleration limiter.
v_accel_range_abs.action-description-en_GB: Acceleration Limiter Up / Down (abs.) - Decreases / increases acceleration limiter.

v_lock_rotation.action-description-en: While active no rotational inputs are allowed to your ship. This is useful for arresting movement when you lost control using a mouse.
v_lock_rotation.action-description-en_GB: While active no rotational inputs are allowed to your ship. This is useful for arresting movement when you lost control using a mouse.

v_ifcs_toggle_cruise_control.action-description-en: Toggles Cruise Control mode on and off
v_ifcs_toggle_cruise_control.action-description-en_GB: Toggles Cruise Control mode on and off

v_transform_cycle.action-description-en: Cycle between the vehicle's expanded and retracted configurations.
v_transform_cycle.action-description-en_GB: Cycle between the vehicle's expanded and retracted configurations.

v_atc_request.action-description-en: Contacts ATC and other landing services.
v_atc_request.action-description-en_GB: Contacts ATC and other landing services.

v_target_toggle_lock_index_1.action-label-en: Pin Index 1 - Lock / Unlock Pinned Target
v_target_toggle_lock_index_1.action-label-en_GB: Pin Index 1 - Lock / Unlock Pinned Target

v_target_toggle_lock_index_2.action-label-en_GB: Pin Index 2 - Lock / Unlock Pinned Target

v_target_toggle_lock_index_3.action-label-en_GB: Pin Index 3 - Lock / Unlock Pinned Target

v_target_toggle_pin_index_1.action-label-en_GB: Pin Index 1 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target

v_target_toggle_pin_index_3.action-label-en_GB: Pin Index 3 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target

v_target_toggle_pin_index_1_hold.action-label-en_GB: Pin Index 1 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target (Hold)

v_target_toggle_pin_index_2_hold.action-label-en: Pin Index 2 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target (Hold)
v_target_toggle_pin_index_2_hold.action-label-en_GB: Pin Index 2 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target (Hold)

v_target_toggle_pin_index_3_hold.action-label-en: Pin Index 3 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target (Hold)
v_target_toggle_pin_index_3_hold.action-label-en_GB: Pin Index 3 - Pin / Unpin Selected Target (Hold)

v_look_ahead_enable.action-description-en: Enables and disables Look Ahead Mode
v_look_ahead_enable.action-description-en_GB: Enables and disables Look Ahead Mode

v_look_ahead_start_target_tracking.action-description-en: Allows you to track a locked target with your head
v_look_ahead_start_target_tracking.action-description-en_GB: Allows you to track a locked target with your head

v_target_tracking_auto_zoom.action-label-en: Auto Zoom On Selected Target On / Off (Toggle, Hold)
v_target_tracking_auto_zoom.action-label-en_GB: Auto Zoom On Selected Target On / Off (Toggle, Hold)
v_target_tracking_auto_zoom.action-description-en: Allows you to enable and disable auto zoom on selected targets.
v_target_tracking_auto_zoom.action-description-en_GB: Allows you to enable and disable auto zoom on selected targets.

v_target_cycle_in_view_reset.action-label-en: Cycle Lock - In View - Under Reticle
v_target_cycle_in_view_reset.action-label-en_GB: Cycle Lock - In View - Under Reticle

v_target_cycle_pinned_reset.action-label-en: Cycle Lock - Pinned - Reset to First
v_target_cycle_pinned_reset.action-label-en_GB: Cycle Lock - Pinned - Reset to First

v_target_cycle_attacker_reset.action-label-en: Cycle Lock - Attackers - Reset to Closest
v_target_cycle_attacker_reset.action-label-en_GB: Cycle Lock - Attackers - Reset to Closest

v_target_cycle_hostile_reset.action-label-en: Cycle Lock - Hostiles - Reset to Closest
v_target_cycle_hostile_reset.action-label-en_GB: Cycle Lock - Hostiles - Reset to Closest

v_target_cycle_friendly_reset.action-label-en: Cycle Lock - Friendlies - Reset to Closest
v_target_cycle_friendly_reset.action-label-en_GB: Cycle Lock - Friendlies - Reset to Closest

v_target_cycle_all_reset.action-label-en: Cycle Lock - All - Reset to Closest
v_target_cycle_all_reset.action-label-en_GB: Cycle Lock - All - Reset to Closest

v_target_cycle_subitem_reset.action-label-en: Cycle Lock - Sub-Target - Reset to Main Target
v_target_cycle_subitem_reset.action-label-en_GB: Cycle Lock - Sub-Target - Reset to Main Target

v_inc_scan_focus_level.action-description-en: Increase the angle of the Scanning Cone
v_inc_scan_focus_level.action-description-en_GB: Increase the angle of the Scanning Cone

v_dec_scan_focus_level.action-description-en: Decrease the angle of the Scanning Cone
v_dec_scan_focus_level.action-description-en_GB: Decrease the angle of the Scanning Cone

v_salvage_toggle_gimbal_mode.action-description-en: Toggle between gimbled and fixed salvage targeting modes.
v_salvage_toggle_gimbal_mode.action-description-en_GB: Toggle between gimbled and fixed salvage targeting modes.

v_salvage_increase_beam_spacing.action-description-en: Increase the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.
v_salvage_increase_beam_spacing.action-description-en_GB: Increase the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

v_salvage_decrease_beam_spacing.action-description-en: Decrease the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.
v_salvage_decrease_beam_spacing.action-description-en_GB: Decrease the spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

v_salvage_beam_spacing_rel.action-description-en: Adjust the relative spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.
v_salvage_beam_spacing_rel.action-description-en_GB: Adjust the relative spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

v_salvage_beam_spacing_abs.action-description-en: Adjust the absolute spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.
v_salvage_beam_spacing_abs.action-description-en_GB: Adjust the absolute spacing between the Vulture's two salvage heads.

v_salvage_toggle_beam_spacing_axis.action-description-en: Set the orientation axis of the salvage beam to vertical or horizontal.
v_salvage_toggle_beam_spacing_axis.action-description-en_GB: Set the orientation axis of the salvage beam to vertical or horizontal.

v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_left.action-description-en: Cycle through available modifiers on the left salvage head or salvage turret.
v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_left.action-description-en_GB: Cycle through available modifiers on the left salvage head or salvage turret.

v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_right.action-description-en: Cycle through available modifiers on the right salvage head or salvage turret.
v_salvage_cycle_modifiers_right.action-description-en_GB: Cycle through available modifiers on the right salvage head or salvage turret.

turret_toggle_mouse_mode.action-label-en: Toggle Turret Mouse Movement (VJoy, FPS style)
turret_toggle_mouse_mode.action-label-en_GB: Toggle Turret Mouse Movement (VJoy, FPS style)
turret_toggle_mouse_mode.action-description-en: Enables / Disables relative mouse mode for turrets
turret_toggle_mouse_mode.action-description-en_GB: Enables / Disables relative mouse mode for turrets

turret_limiter_toggle.action-description-en: Toggles the limiter for the rotational turret speed
turret_limiter_toggle.action-description-en_GB: Toggles the limiter for the rotational turret speed

turret_limiter_rel_increase.action-description-en: Increases the speed of the turret.
turret_limiter_rel_increase.action-description-en_GB: Increases the speed of the turret.

turret_limiter_rel_decrease.action-description-en: Decreases the speed of the turret.
turret_limiter_rel_decrease.action-description-en_GB: Decreases the speed of the turret.

v_weapon_manual_gimbal_cycle_source.action-label-en: Manual Gimbal Mode - Swap VJoy / Look Direction (Toggle, Hold)
v_weapon_manual_gimbal_cycle_source.action-label-en_GB: Manual Gimbal Mode - Swap VJoy / Look Direction (Toggle, Hold)
v_weapon_manual_gimbal_cycle_source.action-description-en: This will cause the aim reticle to either follow the VJoy indication on the HUD or your look direction.
v_weapon_manual_gimbal_cycle_source.action-description-en_GB: This will cause the aim reticle to either follow the VJoy indication on the HUD or your look direction.

v_weapon_manual_gimbal_lock_vector.action-label-en: Manual Gimbal Mode - Lock Aim Vector
v_weapon_manual_gimbal_lock_vector.action-label-en_GB: Manual Gimbal Mode - Lock Aim Vector
v_weapon_manual_gimbal_lock_vector.action-description-en: Locks the aim vector in manual gimbal mode.
v_weapon_manual_gimbal_lock_vector.action-description-en_GB: Locks the aim vector in manual gimbal mode.

v_weapon_gimbal_mode_cycle_all.action-label-en: Cycle Gimbal Assist / Standard Gimbal / Gimbal Lock modes
v_weapon_gimbal_mode_cycle_all.action-label-en_GB: Cycle Gimbal Assist / Standard Gimbal / Gimbal Lock modes

v_weapon_change_firemode.action-description-en: Cycle through staggered and combined fire modes.
v_weapon_change_firemode.action-description-en_GB: Cycle through staggered and combined fire modes.

v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_single.action-label-en: PIP Combination Type: Set One PIP Per Weapon
v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_single.action-label-en_GB: PIP Combination Type: Set One PIP Per Weapon

v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_combin.action-label-en: PIP Combination Type: Set One PIP Per Weapon Type
v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_combin.action-label-en_GB: PIP Combination Type: Set One PIP Per Weapon Type

v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_combin.action-label-en: PIP Combination Type: Set Average Of All
v_weapon_pip_combination_type_set_combin.action-label-en_GB: PIP Combination Type: Set Average Of All

v_weapon_convergence_distance_set_defaul.action-description-en: Resets the Manual Convergence Distance to the default value
v_weapon_convergence_distance_set_defaul.action-description-en_GB: Resets the Manual Convergence Distance to the default value

v_weapon_bombing_hud_range_increase.action-description-en: Increases range by one step in the bomb alignment HUD
v_weapon_bombing_hud_range_increase.action-description-en_GB: Increases range by one step in the bomb alignment HUD

v_weapon_bombing_hud_range_reset.action-description-en: Resets to the default range in the bomb alignment HUD
v_weapon_bombing_hud_range_reset.action-description-en_GB: Resets to the default range in the bomb alignment HUD

v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_launch.action-label-en: Decoy - Launch Burst (tap), Set and Launch Burst (hold)
v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_launch.action-label-en_GB: Decoy - Launch Burst (tap), Set and Launch Burst (hold)

v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_burst_incr.action-description-en: Increases the burst size by one.
v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_burst_incr.action-description-en_GB: Increases the burst size by one.

v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_burst_decr.action-description-en: Decreases the burst size by one.
v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_burst_decr.action-description-en_GB: Decreases the burst size by one.

v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_launch_pan.action-description-en: Launches a large percentage of the countermeasure magazine.
v_weapon_countermeasure_decoy_launch_pan.action-description-en_GB: Launches a large percentage of the countermeasure magazine.

v_cycle_pitch_ladder_mode.action-description-en: Cycles the pitch ladder mode between off, HUD, look direction and mixed.
v_cycle_pitch_ladder_mode.action-description-en_GB: Cycles the pitch ladder mode between off, HUD, look direction and mixed.

visor_wipe.action-description-en: Quickly wipe your helmet visor to improve visibility
visor_wipe.action-description-en_GB: Quickly wipe your helmet visor to improve visibility

weapon_zeroing_decrease.action-description-en: Adjust the weapon scope to accommodate a closer target distance into sighting.
weapon_zeroing_decrease.action-description-en_GB: Adjust the weapon scope to accommodate a closer target distance into sighting.

weapon_zeroing_increase.action-description-en: Adjust the weapon scope to accommodate a farther target distance into sighting.
weapon_zeroing_increase.action-description-en_GB: Adjust the weapon scope to accommodate a farther target distance into sighting.

free_thirdperson_camera.action-description-en: Holding allows free view camera in third person
free_thirdperson_camera.action-description-en_GB: Holding allows free view camera in third person

tractor_beam_increase_distance.action-description-en: Increases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.
tractor_beam_increase_distance.action-description-en_GB: Increases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.

tractor_beam_decrease_distance.action-description-en: Decreases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.
tractor_beam_decrease_distance.action-description-en_GB: Decreases the target distance for an object controlled with the Tractor Beam.

emote_launch.action-description-en: Confirms the launch of the vehicle
emote_launch.action-description-en_GB: Confirms the launch of the vehicle

headtrack_hold.action-description-en: Enables head tracking as long as the button is held down
headtrack_hold.action-description-en_GB: Enables head tracking as long as the button is held down

headtrack_camera_enabled.action-label-en: Enable / Disable Head Tracking for 3rd Person Camera (Toggle)
headtrack_camera_enabled.action-label-en_GB: Enable / Disable Head Tracking for 3rd Person Camera (Toggle)
headtrack_camera_enabled.action-description-en: Enables or disables head tracking in external cameras.
headtrack_camera_enabled.action-description-en_GB: Enables or disables head tracking in external cameras.

view_move_target_Y_pos.action-label-en: Y Offset Positive / Spectator Freecam Focal Point Forward
view_move_target_Y_pos.action-label-en_GB: Y Offset Positive / Spectator Freecam Focal Point Forward

view_move_target_Y_neg.action-label-en: Y Offset Negative/ Spectator Freecam Focal Point Backward
view_move_target_Y_neg.action-label-en_GB: Y Offset Negative/ Spectator Freecam Focal Point Backward
